name: Monster Masquerade
description:
Young Catalina is stuck in a nightmare realm with masked entities. Will she be able to face her fears to escape?

Controls:

Arrows Keys/ WASD -- Movement

Space Bar -- Jump

Mouse Click -- Navigate Menu

M -- Return to Menu (during game)

Credits:

Debbie Berlin “Game Dev Debbie” -- Programming, Level Design

LightspeedLife "Vidavel" -- Music, SFX, Player Animations Cleanup + In-Betweens

Hannah Simmons “Durazorn”-- Monsters, Thumbnail, Welcome screen

Zack Crozier -- Background Art, Tile Art, Music, Sound

Danica "Dani-Claw" Simmons -- Character Art and Animation, Game Design
